entry.title: This Place Needs Some Color
entry.content:
A Nathen Harvey’s suggestion, I tried out (http://99designs.com/) for a logo for this project. I got a lot of designs, which really surprised me.

I have a favorite, I think, but I put up a poll to invite anyone who’s so inclined to register their opinion, and see a sample of the different interpretations I got back.

The poll is here: (https://99designs.com/logo-design/vote-g5ovr4) I’ll leave it up until Friday, February 8.

entry.title: Hello
entry.content: This is the first post for the PetriDish Podcast. More information is coming!
